debug_mode__COMMENT__: To put the bot in debug mode
lock_file__COMMENT__: The file used for the inter-process lock (so only one copy runs at once)
privileges__COMMENT__: Privilege profiles granted to specific users

default.__COMMENT__: This privilege profile is applied if a user doesn't exist

sin.reset_minutes__COMMENT__: Time (in minutes) between resets of available sin points
sin.sin_limit__COMMENT__: The maximum number of sin points that may be earned in reset_minutes time.

telegram.__COMMENT__: The bot token provided by Telegram's BotFather.

database.uri__COMMENT__: The database URI provided to SQLAlchemy.
database.trackModifications__COMMENT__: Instructs SQLAlchemy to track modifications (output emitted SQL)
